name: IZURA Neon Ships [Prototype]
description:
Neon Ships

Neon Ships is an interactive multiplayer shooting game that has a complementary feature, PVP.* 

This game that carries the Neon 80's theme will spoil its players with several interesting options, such as being able to choose up to 4 models of Neon Ships and 3 different arenas. Prepare yourself and start fighting in the arena with your hero neon ships!

Controls

P1 Control
WASD - Move
V - Shoot

P2 Control
Arrow Keys - Move
. - Shoot

This game is made for IGSI Game Jam 2020 #FunFromHome. 

*because this is local multiplayer game only can be played with minimum 2 players.

Development by Izura Studio

Art by itsukarra
Programmed by M Fauzi Rizki H
